Home.Description: Welcome to LFMReview! Share and check reviews about your teachers to improve the educational quality of your community.

FAQ.R1: LFMReviews is a site where you can write and check the community's reviews about different teachers in various grades and subjects at LFM.
FAQ.R2: Most teachers from 6th grade to Terminale are available. However, you can help us enrich our list by sending information about a teacher we haven't listed yet via the 'Add a teacher' tab.
FAQ.Q3: Will people know who published the review?
FAQ.R3: No, all reviews are anonymous. No one will know who published them. We only ask for your email address for database purposes and to prevent the creation of multiple accounts.
FAQ.Q4: Will people know who published the review?
FAQ.R4: No, all reviews are anonymous. No one will know who published them. We only ask for your email address for database purposes and to prevent the creation of multiple accounts.

Auth.signup-paragraph: Join us and share your reviews now!
Auth.login-paragraph: Thanks for coming back, we look forward to your new Reviews.
Auth.invalid-mail: The email address is not valid. Please check and try again.
Auth.invalid-password: The password must be at least 8 characters long, varied between alphanumeric and special characters. It should not contain a common password. Please try again.
Auth.not-corresponding-password: Passwords do not match. Please check and try again.
Auth.password-too-short: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
Auth.email-used: This email address has already been used to create another account.

Cookies.cookie-acceptance: This website uses functional cookies and third-party cookies to enhance your experience. You can choose to accept or reject these cookies. If you continue browsing without selecting an option, we will consider that you accept the use of cookies. To change your preferences, visit the Settings page. For more information, please see our

Teacher.no-rating: No reviews have been made by a user so far. Be the first!

CreateReview.chooseTeacher: To start, please choose the teacher you want to evaluate.
CreateReview.selectSubject: Next, select the subject this teacher teaches.
CreateReview.selectYear: Which year does this teacher teach?
CreateReview.startEvaluation: - Now we can start the evaluation. Please fill in the fields below.
CreateReview.yesOrNoQuestions: - Now, please answer the next questions with yes or no
CreateReview.optionalComment: - You have the option to add a comment (optional). Any type of insult, threat, or inappropriate behavior will not be tolerated.

Error.maintenance: Website maintenance will start in less than 5 minutes...
Error.fatal: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
Error.duplicate-review: A review for this teacher, subject, and year has already been created by the user.
Error.wrong-teacher: The selected teacher is invalid. Please choose a valid teacher.
Error.wrong-subject: The selected subject is invalid. Please choose a valid subject.
Error.wrong-year: The selected year is invalid. Please choose a valid year.
Error.incorrect-grade: The provided rating is incorrect. Ratings must be between 0 and 10.
Error.incorrect-overall: The overall rating is incorrect. The overall rating must be between 0 and 10.
Error.wrong-login: No active account found with the provided credentials. Check if you have verified your account through your inbox.
Error.request-reset-password: The request was not completed. Please try again.
Error.404: The accessed page does not exist
Error.teacher-query: An error occurred while searching for teachers
Error.text-rating-forbidden-characters: The characters used (such as special characters and accents) in the review are forbidden.

Success.create-review: The review has been successfully created
Success.signup: Your account has been created successfully. Check your inbox to activate it.
Success.login: You are successfully logged in to your account
Success.request-reset-password: The request was successful. Check your inbox.
